Pre-Game Insights: Cyprus and Lithuania are both struggling in their European Championship qualifiers, with Cyprus on a seven-game losing streak and Lithuania winless in 17 of their last 18 matches.
Cyprus has lost all eight games in the 2024 European Championship qualifiers, while Lithuania has only one victory since March 2022.
Cyprus holds a slight historical advantage with two wins in their last three meetings, but they have lost five consecutive home matches.
The match is a friendly fixture at Alphamega Stadium, with both teams seeking a morale-boosting result.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article mentions betting tips, such as expecting a draw and fewer than five cards or 11 corners.
